step_1.description: Abnormal accumulation of a-synuclein in Lewy bodies is a hallmark of PD. Mutations in a-synuclein cause familial PD, and the study shows wild-type, but not mutant, a-synuclein downregulates dopamine synthesis genes.

step_2.description: Microarray and qRT-PCR assays are gene expression analyses, directly relevant to the disease mechanism of altered gene regulation.

substep_3a.replicates_used: Unclear (paper states 'confirmed selected genes' but does not specify replicates).

substep_3b.description: Microarray and qRT-PCR are standard techniques in the field.

substep_3c.description: No explicit mention of pathogenic/benign variants used as controls.

substep_4a.description: No explicit statistical tests (e.g., p-values, OddsPath) reported for the variants.

substep_4b.controls_count: Unclear (paper does not specify number of controls).
